ROBIN PATRA 
DIRECTOR OF DATA & AI – PRDOCUTS , PLATFORM & SERVICES ENGINEERING
 
510.365.8535 |  robin.patra@gmail.com | San Jose, CA | Linkedin.com/in/robinpatra 
 
PROFILE 
 
Engineering   leader   with  20   years   of   combined   experience   in  data  &   business   analytics   engineering,   software 
engineering, technology leadership & roadmap. Specialize in leading & delivering digital transformation by evolving, 
establishing, and maturing Data , Analytics & BI functions driven by data platforms, products, and services. 
 
Highly  experienced  in  scaling  &  managing  teams  across  geographies  and  different  time  zones  to  deliver  successful 
transformation and great products.  
 
Focused on managing and growing productive, highly collaborative teams. Believe teams work best when they feel safe, 
and are well-equipped for their challenging work.
